Package ohos.accessibility.ability

Interface DisplayResizeListener


  • public interface DisplayResizeListener
    Provides a callback to listen for display resizing operations.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDisplayResizeChanged​(DisplayResizeController controller, Rect rect, float scale, float centerX, float centerY)
      Called when the rectangle, scale, or center coordinate for performing the resizing operations is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onDisplayResizeChanged

        void onDisplayResizeChanged​(DisplayResizeController controller,
                            Rect rect,
                            float scale,
                            float centerX,
                            float centerY)
        Called when the rectangle, scale, or center coordinate for performing the resizing operations is changed.
        Parameters:
        controller - Indicates the controller for display resizing operations.
        rect - Indicates the rectangle for resizing the display.
        scale - Indicates the scale for resizing the display, ranging from 1.0f to 10.0f.
        centerX - Indicates the X coordinate of the center for resizing the display.
        centerY - Indicates the Y coordinate of the center for resizing the display.
        Since:
        4
